name: Makeover Tile: Zen Match
description:
Welcome to Makeover Tile! Immerse yourself in unique tile sets and enjoy the tile fun level by level. Keep up with the interior story and leave no detail untouched. Integrate the fun of eliminating blocks and the fulfillment of renovating your own home.

Game Features:
- A rich and diverse combination of tiles to explore level by level. Pair up every 3 of the same objects to solve the puzzle. Exciting!
- Multiple ways to get essential props to pass the levels. Fun!
- Bring your dream to reality by decorating the living room, the swimming pool...Pay attention to every small detail, like the wall paintings, the lamps, work as an interior designer. Satisfying!
- Various festival and holiday activities to enrich the gameplay, the Thanksgiving day event, the Spring Festival activity...Relaxing！
- Easy levels at the beginning and challenging ones as you progress further. Be a tile master level by level. Inspiring！
- Suits well for all ages.

In this makeover plus board game, the combination of match-3 game and home design doubles the happiness. You can also present your decorating talents and problem-solving skill.

Try Makeover Tile now! This game will be your preference.
